The best thing about Prime Minister Christopher Luxon’s absence from Waitangi - Audrey Young https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/the-best-the-best-the-bout-prime-minister-minister-christopher-luxon-luxons-absence-from-waitang--waitang-audrey-young/gzkupn6lhjeztkftuw24y6o24y6o2pu/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/the-best-the-best-the-bout-prime-minister-minister-christopher-luxon-luxons-absence-from-waitang--waitang-audrey-young/gzkupn6lhjeztkftuw24y6o24y6o2pu/ Audrey YoungOPINION: Luxon's absence shone a light on the best speech about the Treaty in many years. Fri, 07 Feb 2025 00:21:06 +0000 Justin Tipa's speech on Waitangi Day showed "the leadership that has been missing in the debate not just over the Treaty Principles Bill but the direction of the country and how the Treaty should fit into our constitutional monarchy in modern times," writes Audrey Young. Photo / Supplied
